info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:52PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Tuscola, northwestern Sanilac and Huron Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 352 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Port Austin to near Caseville to 8 miles northwest of Unionville. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Port Austin around 355 PM EDT. Pigeon around 400 PM EDT. Elkton, Unionville and Owendale around 405 PM EDT. Akron and Fairgrove around 410 PM EDT. Bad Axe and Port Hope around 415 PM EDT. Caro around 420 PM EDT. Harbor Beach and Ubly around 425 PM EDT. Argyle around 435 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Parisville, Colling, Wisner, Ivanhoe, Rapson, Grindstone City, Ellington, Silverwood, New Greenleaf and Port Crescent State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
